channel.title: Webclient
channel.description:
Well, my webclient is almost working it downloads cache and then it says client updated please reload
I think i may have zipped the client wrong. I'm not sure which files to put in the zip
I have the files cache, sprites,(these first to i know go in there)user, javazoom, bin, and models. DO i put all of them in there?

item.title: Webclient
item.dc:creator: @Aceron4 Aceron4
item.description:
@Aceron4 wrote:

Make sure you zipped the files INSIDE the cache folder and not the cache folder itself.

Also. Check your signlink.java to make sure the client is grabbing the cache from the right location.

Read full topic
